website_summaries.verdict: Versatile and portable high-vibration massage roller with durable silicone exterior, and it's available in three colors.
pros: can be used on specific body areas needing relief from muscular tightness or soreness
Runs for 3-hr minimum on rechargeable batteries
cons: Price falls on the higher end of the spectrum

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Using it currently as I write this review. I was a little skeptical at first as I thought it was more of a gimmick/marketing device, but what I've realized is that it make it a lot easier to massage and roll out the muscles without lying on the floor and using your body weight which makes it convenient for use at home or at the office. Just be advised that to turn it off you'll need to go through the higher settings which gave me a little shock, but it's not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Shin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tratac ActiveBall!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it a couple of days ago and have been using it since and this is really great! I knew about vibrating foam roller from before but didn’t know there was a peanut ball shape that vibrates. The peanut shape really does massage deeply on topical areas where I have my muscle knots. I see why vibration is good because it just massages me without even moving or rolling onto my body! Rolling on it is also pretty fun. Very content with my purchase and really enjoying it! Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Best deep tissue massage ball period
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Best deep tissue massage ball period. It's literally perfect for shoulder blade. The variable speeds is a plus and battery seems to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Morita

customer_reviews.title: impressed with Tratac Activeball
customer_reviews.text: I was already impressed with Tratac Activeball and when I saw the Activeball I was excited. I felt that something like this could target my upper back between my shoulder blades better, where I usually use two tennis balls to roll and get out pops. The quality was better than I had expected, and it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Chareles Hong

customer_reviews.title: Best for muscle soreness
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed interesting so I purchased it, and it turned out to be perfect for my recent hamstring injury and neck soreness from bad sleeping posture. It was especially good for my hamstring because it’s an area with heavy muscle mass and massaging with hands will make your hand mucles suffer lol. Use it above a cushion so that it doesnt vibrate your floor or bed.
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

customer_reviews.title: This portable massager is a game changer.
customer_reviews.text: This portable massager is a game changer. Very very comfortable to hold and easy to use, cute design and really works well on sore shoulders, neck and lower back. Easy to self massage. The three point of power level works great depends how much I have sore muscles and aches. No batteries needed and recharges pretty quick. I highly highly recommend this cute massager.
customer_reviews.author: RR Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Awsome on Neck Pain in the morning!!
customer_reviews.text: It is fantastic to cure the neck pain in the morning from mal-positions when you sleep. It was awsome for my daughter to make a massage from my neck to my back, specially lower back after my tennis game. I bring it to my office and do it for my back when I seat on my chair, putting Tractec between my back and seat back, good for long time. I recommend you after sports and sleeping with wrong position. Kids like it to do a massage with it. If you want a big favor from your kids for a good relationship, take it....
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: i love this massager
customer_reviews.text: i love this massager! i use it every day and it has made a big impact on my mobility and general well being. i recommend it to all my teammates and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong cute looking massage ball
customer_reviews.text: Strong vibration. Very satisfied. My legs get sore pretty often and since the product is designed to be rolled, I can massage on any part of my legs with convenience just by rolling the ball. A cute design of the product is plus.
customer_reviews.author: ypatty

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Simple!! Best self-myofascial release & deep tissue massage
customer_reviews.text: If you are exercising or want to lose weight, you should know about this product. It helps muscle relaxation after exercise and helps break down cellulite. I particularly like to use this product on the soles of the foot. It is because I gain my weight a lot and the sole is sick recently. After exercising, It helps to massage the sick foot to cool down. I love this small designed peanut massage ball because of used in the gym. This is the best exercise partner and doctor for me.
customer_reviews.author: YOUNGHWA CHOI

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Peanut Ball
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and a strong motor. My muscles are tight and sore. Within days I felt the difference on my walking because my muscles were relaxed. Once I get used to the remote, I am going to be in love with this! I’m sitting in a chair right now and press the ball against the sole of the feet and roll between the heel and toe. My leg was really sore but I'm in heaven!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lee

customer_reviews.title: ZERO POWER
customer_reviews.text: If you are an adult this product is not for you. Totally lacks power. I have played with and paid for all types of massage toys. I hate it. I recommend this to those with zero pain tolerance.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! The second I opened up the box I ...
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! The second I opened up the box I turned it on and immediately used it on my back. The vibration is very much high intensity, and it was mellow at first then got stronger each time I pushed the button. My back immediately felt better I would recommend this to anyone who works out a lot or has a bad back. What I also love about it is that's it's small and doesn't take up a lot of space in our apartment. It's easy to store and totally worth every penny! UPDATE: Everyone at my house over Christmas time LOVED this ball. Especially for their backs.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief and relaxation
customer_reviews.text: My Physical therapist used this and I purchased one for home. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Emily E.

customer_reviews.title: Even without the vibration turned on it works great! If you need the vibration
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to use but I have been using it instead. I'm around 6 months pregnant and am having muscle pain in my lower back and glutes. I can't lay flat on my back but it worked surprisingly well against the wall. I really appreciated that it came with a booklet that showed all of the different ways you could use it as well. Even without the vibration turned on it works great! If you need the vibration, the intensity is really strong. I would definitely recommend this product. Sidenote: Our Amazon account is in my husband's name if anyone was confused.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey N. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Really amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing product!! The design and material is really convenient to work around my whole body. It really helps my back since I injured it a week ago. The vibration has different levels, so you can adjust however you like(Vibration has some power). Charging up is easy and quick. It's a really amazing product and worth every single penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed !
customer_reviews.text: The intensity level you can achieve with the ActiveBall is far beyond any similar products I have tried. A fair comparison would be to say that level one of the ActiveBall is equal to the max of others but then you have two ther levels. Amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Harald  E Fricker

customer_reviews.title: Design A+ Materials A+ Guts F-
customer_reviews.text: Vibration is not equal on both sides. Battery life SUCKS. The other reviews on here are questionable. I threw away the box or I would send it back. I have Hyperice vyper and hypersphere and the quality of those blow this Tratac away. I bought the Tratac because of the smaller size and the shape to hit both sides of the spine at once. The design itself and the material are awesome. The guts of it are terrible. I would never recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: extremer

product_meta.title: Tratac ActiveBall - High Intensity Fitness Vibration Ball/Back Pain & Recovery Massage Ball (9Hx18L, Grey)
product_meta.description: Size:9Hx18L| Color:GreyThe Tratac Active Ball is a fast recharging portable equipment that allows you to apply pressure to treat muscle dysfunction. And this is efficiently designed for self-myofascial release & deep tissue massage.It is a versatile exercise product that can be used in the gym, the home or rehabilitation center. Advantages of Silicon material- High temperature stability - Resistance to aging & chemical assault - High thermal insulation - More durable than rubbers or elastomers Functions of the button - Press once : Shows battery remains - Press one more time : Vibration starts - Press again to change vibration intensity/level - Hold 2-3 seconds to turn off
feature_bullets: GREAT FITNESS TOOL for back pain, sore muscles, pain relief and all kinds of muscle pain.
THREE High Intensity Vibrations to choose from - Level 1 : 2,200rpm Level 2 : 3,300rpm upto Level 3 : 4,000rpm

BEST RECOVERY MASSAGE BALL for your work outs, playing sports, doing any sort of indoor or outdoor activities. Peanut shaped is perfectly designed for your body to stimulate deeper than anything you have tried.

RISK FREE ONE YEAR WARRANTY from the date you have purchased ActiveBall. We are proud to tell you the defect rate is below 1% and even if there is one, we are 100% guaranteed for a full refund or a replacement.
COMPACT SIZE of 7inch x 3.5inch - Super PORTABLE to anywhere from home, office, gym, you name it!
